events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your site but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit me properly and I no longer need it.
The customer's request involves refund due to sizing issues, classified under refund for further handling.
Assigning the case to the refund specialist team to handle the customer's refund request properly.
Hello! Thanks for contacting us. I understand you'd like a refund for your jacket. We're here to help resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or washed? This will help us process your refund.
My order number is 123456789. The jacket has not been used or washed at all; it's still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket to our warehouse within 14 days, and once received we will issue a full refund to your original payment method.
Thanks for the clear instructions. I will send it back by tomorrow and appreciate your prompt assistance.
We have received the returned jacket and issued your refund. You should see the amount back on your card within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm you received the refund and to see if there is anything else we can help you with.
Since your refund has been processed and you have confirmed receipt, we are now closing this case. Thank you for your business.
